relationships.evidence_text: Lauren is the executive director of Kiss the Ground, which we'll be talking about in today's discussion.

ended up writing her thesis on the ineffectiveness of US food aid in Ethiopia, North Korea and Malawi.
she also helped to develop a nonprofit called Greenlight New Orleans.
